forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 28C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 83F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies this evening will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 22C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 71F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 63F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.
